document.heading: Marijuana Possession Decriminalization Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-126, the “Marijuana Possession Decriminalization Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-409. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 4, 2014, and March 4, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 31, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-305 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-126 became effective on July 17, 2014.
